mapper.delete: delete from pt_menu_directory where menu_id = #{id} and menu_id not in (select distinct res_uuid from pt_role_res)
mapper.select: select m.menu_id, m.dir_code, m.dir_name, m.dir_level_number, m.parent_id, if(ISNULL(n.dir_name), 'root', n.dir_name) as parent_dir_name, m.isitem, m.dir_order, m.status, m.flag, m.locale, m.res_uuid, r.res_url from pt_menu_directory m left join pt_res r on m.res_uuid=r.res_uuid left join pt_menu_directory n on m.parent_id=n.menu_id where m.menu_id=#{id}

select m.menu_id, m.dir_code, m.dir_name, m.dir_level_number, m.parent_id, if(ISNULL(n.dir_name), 'root', n.dir_name) as parent_dir_name, m.isitem, m.dir_order, m.status, m.flag, m.locale, m.res_uuid, r.res_url from pt_menu_directory m left join pt_res r on m.res_uuid=r.res_uuid left join pt_menu_directory n on m.parent_id=n.menu_id where m.parent_id=#{pid}

select m.menu_id, m.dir_code, m.dir_name, m.dir_level_number, m.parent_id, if(ISNULL(n.dir_name), 'root', n.dir_name) as parent_dir_name, m.isitem, m.dir_order, m.status, m.flag, m.locale, m.res_uuid, r.res_url from pt_menu_directory m left join pt_res r on m.res_uuid=r.res_uuid left join pt_menu_directory n on m.parent_id=n.menu_id limit #{0}, #{1}
select count(*) from pt_menu_directory m left join pt_res r on m.res_uuid=r.res_uuid left join pt_menu_directory n on m.parent_id=n.menu_id
